## Methods and Results

### Data Download and Extraction

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
# Run download script
system('Rscript 00_download_data.R --url "https://opendata.vancouver.ca/explore/dataset/street-trees/download" --output "data/street-trees.csv"')

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
# Run cleaning script and display duplicate info
output <- system('Rscript 01_clean_transform.R --input "data/street-trees.csv" --output "data/cleaned_street_trees.csv"', intern = TRUE)
cat(output, sep="\n")
```




```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
# Generate EDA artifacts
output <- system('Rscript 02_eda.R --input "data/cleaned_street_trees.csv" --output_prefix "results/eda"', intern = TRUE)
cat(output, sep="\n")

# Display heatmap
![](results/eda_heatmap.png)

# Include the contingency table
```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
read_csv("results/eda_cont_table.csv") %>%
  kable(caption = "Contingency table of tree height by neighborhood")
```




### Statistical Test

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
# Run statistical test script
output <- system('Rscript 03_statistical_test.R --input "data/cleaned_street_trees.csv" --output "results/chisq_test_results.txt"', intern = TRUE)
cat(output, sep="\n")
